title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 §§ 613-5.3 - Inspections and leak detection
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 §§ 613-5.3 - Inspections and leak detection

State Regulations
(a) UST systems. Components
of UST systems must be monitored for leaks in accordance with section
2.3
of this Part, with the
exception of ASTs, which must meet the requirements of section 4.3 of this

Part. (b) AST
systems. Components of AST systems must be inspected and monitored for
leaks in accordance with section 4.3 of this Part, with the exception of USTs, which must meet the requirements of section
3.3
of this Part. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6
§§
613-5.3

Adopted, New

York State Register September 30, 2015/Volume XXXVII, Issue 39, eff. 10/11/2015

Adopted

New

York State Register July 19, 2023/Volume XLV Issue 29, eff. 10/17/2023

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
